Package fr.umlv.escapeirandroid.game

Class Summary
EscapeIR This is the main class.
FactoryLevel The Class FactoryLevel provides a way instantiate a level with the name of the board corresponding
GameActivity This class launch the game, manage click event and gesture event
GameBoard The Class GameBoard describes of what is composed a level
GameThread  
GameThread.GameCode The code for the thread with the accumulator to dispatch between update and render
GameView The Class GameView is the main game view
Level The Class Level.
MyContactListener The class MyContactListener offers to keep track of the collisions happening between two bodies in the physic world, during a step.
MyQueryCallback The Class MyQueryCallback offers to keep track of the bodies that aren't in the display area anymore
State The Class State provides descriptions of different states during the game
WorldManager The Class WorldManager describes the world and interact with Jbox2d world
 

Enum Summary
State.gameState The different state during the game
State.scrollingState The state of the scrolling
